attributes.action: Michelle Donelan must stand down as an MP
attributes.additional_details:
WHAT A TRAITOR. This is not what the people wanted.
 Please sign this petition to have her removed from this position of trust as clearly she can not be trusted to serve the people.  If you live in Wiltshire and voted leave please make your views of this disrespectful human being known to her and demand she step down from this position-

Email: michelle.donelan.mp@parliament.uk

Constituency Office: 01249 704465
Michelle Donelan MP, 61 New Road, Chippenham, SN15 1ES
attributes.background:
In the 2016 referendum Wiltshire voted to leave the EU by a majority of in excess of 14,000 votes. This is what the majority wanted and Therefor this should be represented in parliament.
HOWEVER our local MP MICHELLE DONELAN decided to go against her constituents and voted FOR the brexit deal.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
